translations.translation: Truly this is the Great Victory!
This will indeed be great happiness.
Surely this is the supreme triumph.
This is certainly the greatest triumph
“This is, most certainly, the supreme success.”
Truly, this is the supreme success!
Most surely this is the mighty achievement.
This is indeed the mighty triumph,
Lo! this is the supreme triumph.
Truly, this is a great victory!"
Verily this! that is the supreme achievement.
This is indeed the supreme triumph!’
Verily this is the supreme achievement!
Truly, this is the supreme success!
Indeed, this is the mighty victory,
Indeed, this is the great attainment.
[37:60] Truly this, that has mentioned [as being the reward] for the inhabitants of Paradise, is indeed the mighty success.

(Lo! this is the Supreme Triumph) this is the ultimate safety; we gained Paradise and all that which is in it 509 and were saved from hell and all that which is in it. The story of these two brothers is the same story of the two brothers mentioned in surah al-Kahf, one of whom was a believer, this is Yehuda, and the other an unbeliever, Abu Qutrus.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا } الخلود والتنعم والسرور بلا طريان ضد عليه { لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ } [الصافات: 60] والكرم الجسيم من الله العليم الحكيم إيانا


ثم قيل من قبل الحق
 ترغيباً للمؤمنين على الطاعات وحثاً لهم إلى الإيتان بالأعمال الصالحات
 وتطييباً لقلوبهم بترتب أمثال هذه الحسنات على أعمالهم وأخلاقهم ومواجيدهم وحالاتهم
